analysis.description:
USDO._transfer (/unique_chucks/19/0x7c33abe7c6d0cb7cdb1a9546780fafa696c9cb99.sol#815-842) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(_balances.balanceOf(_from) + _balances.balanceOf(_to) == previousBalances)

Reentrancy in ControllerContract.limitBurnFrom (/unique_chucks/19/0x7c33abe7c6d0cb7cdb1a9546780fafa696c9cb99.sol#682-701):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_balances.balanceOf(_from) >= _amount && _amount <= dailyBurnLimit) (/unique_chucks/19/0x7c33abe7c6d0cb7cdb1a9546780fafa696c9cb99.sol#685-689)
	- _balances.subBalance(_from,_amount) (/unique_chucks/19/0x7c33abe7c6d0cb7cdb1a9546780fafa696c9cb99.sol#694-695)
	- _balances.subTotalSupply(_amount) (/unique_chucks/19/0x7c33abe7c6d0cb7cdb1a9546780fafa696c9cb99.sol#696)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- burnLimiter (/unique_chucks/19/0x7c33abe7c6d0cb7cdb1a9546780fafa696c9cb99.sol#697-698)
	- burnLimiter (/unique_chucks/19/0x7c33abe7c6d0cb7cdb1a9546780fafa696c9cb99.sol#698-700)

Reentrancy in ControllerContract.limitMint (/unique_chucks/19/0x7c33abe7c6d0cb7cdb1a9546780fafa696c9cb99.sol#708-733):
	External calls:
	- _balances.addBalance(_to,_amount) (/unique_chucks/19/0x7c33abe7c6d0cb7cdb1a9546780fafa696c9cb99.sol#726-727)
	- _balances.addTotalSupply(_amount) (/unique_chucks/19/0x7c33abe7c6d0cb7cdb1a9546780fafa696c9cb99.sol#727)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- mintLimiter (/unique_chucks/19/0x7c33abe7c6d0cb7cdb1a9546780fafa696c9cb99.sol#727-729)
	- mintLimiter (/unique_chucks/19/0x7c33abe7c6d0cb7cdb1a9546780fafa696c9cb99.sol#729-731)

ControllerContract.shouldVerify (/unique_chucks/19/0x7c33abe7c6d0cb7cdb1a9546780fafa696c9cb99.sol#657-664) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_verifiedList.setShouldVerify(value) (/unique_chucks/19/0x7c33abe7c6d0cb7cdb1a9546780fafa696c9cb99.sol#659-660)

Reentrancy in ControllerContract.limitBurnFrom (/unique_chucks/19/0x7c33abe7c6d0cb7cdb1a9546780fafa696c9cb99.sol#682-701):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_balances.balanceOf(_from) >= _amount && _amount <= dailyBurnLimit) (/unique_chucks/19/0x7c33abe7c6d0cb7cdb1a9546780fafa696c9cb99.sol#685-689)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- burnLimiter (/unique_chucks/19/0x7c33abe7c6d0cb7cdb1a9546780fafa696c9cb99.sol#692)
